short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Too many meetings? No problem! This #1 productivity app will allow you to reclaim your time by busting your Google Calendar entries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Being a manager is a great adventure. You lead your team, you are their mentor, they trust you and rely on you. Oh, how wonderful feeling it is.

But hey, something is wrong. You once used to spend a lot of time sitting at your desk, wishing you could go out and chase squirrels. But now all you do is run between conference rooms, and you actually miss being able to sit down at your own spot and do something useful yourself. You barely find time to eat your lunch between all these meetings.

Don't give up! MeetBuster is here to help you.

1. Open your Google Calendar.
2. Make sure you are in the week view.
3. Click the MeetBuster icon. You should see a paddle and a ball; if you don't, refresh the calendar page and try again.
4. Click anywhere on the site to start playing.
5. Have fun!
6. To get back to the reality, click the MeetBuster icon once again. Don't worry; your precious meetings only disappeared for a while. Your calendar still looks as miserable as it looked before.
